data.message: What has been up with the most recent settings lately ? It's all out of order and basically just like the default settings , DO NOT LIKE IT AT ALL !!!!

replies.message: We’re sorry to hear that, Ellen. If there's anything you'd like for us to change, please let us know here: http://bit.ly/2sk6dgD. Additionally, there are a few options for you to customize what you see in your own News Feed. You can choose to see fewer stories from a friend or Unfollow them to stop seeing any updates from them in your News Feed. See instructions on how to customize your feed here: http://bit.ly/2rGkq6b. -Jessica

This reply has absolutely nothing to do with what i asked,  I seriously don't think humans answer people's questions,  I think it's a bunch of bots answering,  because you never directly give anyone answers , you just give them links to click on to,  which absolutely does no good
